alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Mason; Pleasants; Wirt; Wood (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 27 at 12:24PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Meigs, eastern Gallia, Washington, southeastern Morgan, southeastern Athens, west central Pleasants, northern Mason, northwestern Wirt, northwestern Jackson and Wood Counties through 130 PM EST... At 1223 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles south of Chesterhill to 11 miles west of Buffalo. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Parkersburg, Marietta, Belpre, Point Pleasant, Gallipolis, Pomeroy, Beverly, Racine, Coolville, Rutland, Forked Run State Park, Vienna, Ravenswood, Williamstown, New Haven, Mason, Mineralwells, Washington, Tuppers Plains and Lubeck. This includes the following highways... Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 147 and 186. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 1 and 17. Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 1 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
